formattedAddress: 355 W 52nd St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 355 W 52nd St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
A total 5 star cardiologist
I've been going to Dr. Janis for a few years and I have to say his service and expertise is excellent! His skills as a diagnostician, and to look deeper into an issue. While his expertise is cardiology, he is so adept at looking at correlating issues (cholestrol, etc) to offer a plan of action. I've been deeply impressed by how specific and customized his care is and he's got a very good bedside manner as a person as well.

originalText.text: Dr Janis has been my mother's cardiologist for a few years , besides being extremely knowledgeable and professional,  he's listens to our concerns and that's what sets him apart from many cardiologists we've had in the past

text.text: Dr Janis has been my mother's cardiologist for a few years , besides being extremely knowledgeable and professional,  he's listens to our concerns and that's what sets him apart from many cardiologists we've had in the past

originalText.text: Dr. Janis is a wonderful and attentive doctor. My mother has been a patient of his for many years, and now I am as well. I can confirm that he cares deeply for his patients - he's very thorough in his explanations, and answers questions to the point,  but without the arrogant attitude that some doctors have used to explain complex terminologies. I truly recommend Dr. Janis to your family, because when it comes to my mom's health, and mine, we don't take that lightly.

text.text: Dr. Janis is a wonderful and attentive doctor. My mother has been a patient of his for many years, and now I am as well. I can confirm that he cares deeply for his patients - he's very thorough in his explanations, and answers questions to the point,  but without the arrogant attitude that some doctors have used to explain complex terminologies. I truly recommend Dr. Janis to your family, because when it comes to my mom's health, and mine, we don't take that lightly.

originalText.text: I went to my 2nd visit during this covid pandemic. His office and staff and ultrasound techs are amazing and nurses are all kind and professional. Dr. Janice is one of the best Doctors I have ever engaged with. His bed side manners are superb. Hes kind and smart and educational. Hes patient and respectful and listens carefully and with compassion. He made me feel safe and secure. Hes been very honest and open with me and has quick responses to my messages aka emails. Hes caring and I trust him and am so grateful hes my Doctor.

originalText.text: I do not recommend Dr. Gregory Janis. Appointments will get canceled and you will not be notified until you arrive. Frustrating front office staff.
